overview: The Disco Biscuits culminate three consecutive sold-out shows with a historic New Year's Eve performance for nearly 10,000 fans. Filmed at New Jersey's Tweeter Center, the show pays tribute to one of the biggest names on the jam-band circuit. Interviews with band members, fans and behind-the-scenes rehearsal footage -- in addition to their signature musical tapestries -- make this an unforgettable experience.
title: Disco Biscuits: Progressions
